... first marathon while pregnant. In May, the Westchester woman ran the Wisconsin Marathon in 4:23:07 while... weeks. Marathon world-record holder Paula Radcliffe ran 14 miles a day while pregnant and resumed training... starting marathon training for the first time. For pregnant runners, close monitoring by a doctor is recommended.
